alert.note: Alert for Grand and Battlement Mesas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 28 at 1:27PM MDT until October 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT SUNDAY ABOVE 8500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 8500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches for a storm total of 10 to 18 inches. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
